rooms.description: Spacious living area with natural light from the north-facing entrance and Mediterranean design elements.
Modern Mediterranean kitchen featuring a central island and energy-efficient appliances.
Comfortable master bedroom with ample storage and north-east oriented Vastu-compliant layout.
Functional bathroom attached to the master bedroom.
Small utility room for laundry and storage, placed near the kitchen.

openings.description: North-facing main entrance ensuring positive energy flow according to Vastu principles.
West-facing windows in living room for balanced natural light.

features.description: Integrated swimming pool with Mediterranean styling located at the rear of the villa, designed to be a relaxing space while adhering to local norms.
landscaped garden area adjacent to the living area for leisure and relaxation.
